## EthersStabilioStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./lib-ethers.ethersstabilioconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EthersStabilioStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledStabilioStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledstabiliostore.md) will be created.
